info: General information about the sources used.
last_update: The time of the last file update, represented as Unix Epoch time.
authors: Names of the individuals who contributed to editing the text.
reviewers: Names of the individuals who reviewed the text.

primary_sources.id: Unique identifier for the specific primary source.
primary_sources.date: Date when the link was accessed.
primary_sources.url: External link to access the paper/book.

reference_sources.id: Unique identifier for the specific reference source.
reference_sources.citation: Citation for the reference that discusses a primary source or person.
reference_sources.date: Date when the link was accessed.
reference_sources.url: External link to access the paper/book.

religious_sources.id: Unique identifier for the specific religious source.
religious_sources.citation: Citation for the religious source that discusses a person.
religious_sources.date: Date when the link was accessed.
religious_sources.url: External link to access the paper/book.
